name: Horror By Dave
description:
You may know me from such Embeds as ScaryMonsters and ScaryMonstersv2, so why is this a separate Embed?
Well, because it's been completely redone from scratch with over 180 images (not including flips). The best (in my opinion) of my old embed has been fed into it. Tried to make this one more malleable.

Its a style that will make for a horror aesthetic, I have found between 35 and 45 steps with DPM++ SDE seem to be the sweet spot.

Just add ",by HorrorByDave" to the end of your prompt.

If you want more natural looking people in the image, adding this to the negatives(SocalGuitairists, Magic FaceLift). Strangely it also helps bring out the Christmas in Christmas images lol

Yes the samples have a few Christmas images in them...its Christmas after all :)

MERRY CHRISTMAS ALL!

This is a v2.1 768 embed

Prompt ideas:

  1. something evil in a shopping mall, tentacles, 8k, photo, hyper detailed, by HorrorByDave

  2. something evil on the subway, outside is raining, night, 8k, photo, hyper detailed, by HorrorByDave

  3. something evil looking in from outside a window, as seen from inside a cosy living room, outside is raining, night, 8k, photo, hyper detailed, by HorrorByDave

  4. santa looking in through a window, as seen from inside a cosy living room, rain, night, 8k, photo, hyper detailed, by HorrorByDave

  5. Some one, or some, thing on the wing of the plane, looking out of the airplane window, rain, night, 8k, photo, hyper detailed, by HorrorByDave
